name: Paccle
description:
This was a fan-made / student project game created purely for the love of Pac-Man. This prototype is 100% free and will never cost anything, and therefore falls into legal use of copyright. 

NOTE: Game requires Godot Version 3 to play

Godot is the game engine used to make the prototype, there is no executable file!

Feel free to leave me questions!

- Joshua :)
